seg.source: Auslands-Ticker: Zahl der Toten auf Sulawesi steigt auf mehr als 400
seg.translation: International news ticker: Number of dead in Sulawesi rises to more than 400
International News: Number of dead on Sulawesi rises to more than 400
Foreign ticker: Death toll in Sulawesi rises to more than 400

seg.source: Nach dem schweren Erdbeben der Stärke 7,5 und anschließenden Tsunami auf der indonesischen Insel Sulawesi ist von mindestens 420 Todesopfer die Rede.
seg.translation: After the severe magnitude 7.5 earthquake and subsequent tsunami on the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, there are reports of at least 420 casualties.
At least 420 people are reported to have died after a severe earthquake measuring 7.5 on the Richter scale followed by a tsunami on the Indonesian island of Sulawesi.
At least 420 people have been reported dead following the powerful 7.5-magnitude earthquake and subsequent tsunami on the Indonesian island of Sulawesi.

seg.source: Die Opferzahl könne noch weiter steigen.
seg.translation: Reportedly, the number of victims could rise even further.
The number of victims could yet rise further.
The death toll could rise further, he said.

seg.source: Die Rettungsmannschaften sind noch nicht in die verwüsteten und von der Außenwelt abgeschnittenen Gebiete vorgedrungen.
seg.translation: The rescue teams have not yet progressed into the ravaged and isolated areas.
Rescue teams have not yet been able to move into the desert region, which is cut off from the outside world.
Rescue teams have not yet entered the devastated areas cut off from the outside world.

seg.source: Elon Musk tritt als Tesla-Aufsichtsratschef zurück
seg.translation: Elon Musk resigns as Tesla chairman
Elon Musk resigns as head of Tesla
Elon Musk resigns as Tesla chief executive

seg.source: Am Anfang war ein Tweet.
seg.translation: In the beginning, there was a tweet.
It all started with a tweet.
In the beginning was a tweet.

seg.source: Tesla-Chef Elon Musk sorgte Anfang August für Unruhe an den Aktienmärkten, als er einen Rückzug des Eletroautobauers ankündigte.
seg.translation: Tesla boss Elon Musk caused nervousness on the stock markets in early August when he announced a withdrawal by the electric car manufacturer.
Tesla chief Elon Musk caused uncertainty on the equity markets when he announced that he would step down as head of the electric car manufacturer.
Tesla boss Elon Musk caused a stir in the stock markets in early August when he announced the electric car maker was pulling out.

seg.source: Die US-Börsenaufsicht verklagte ihn wegen Betrugs, doch jetzt haben sich beide geeinigt.
seg.translation: The US Securities and Exchange Commission sued him for fraud, but the parties have now agreed to a settlement.
The SEC had accused him of fraud; both parties have reached a settlement.
The US Securities and Exchange Commission sued him for fraud, but the two have now reached an agreement.

seg.source: Tesla und Musk müssen zahlen, und der Tesla-Chef zieht sich aus dem Aufsichtsrat zurück, Vorstandsvorsitzender darf er aber bleiben.
seg.translation: Tesla and Musk have to pay, and the Tesla boss steps down as chairman, but he may remain as CEO.
Tesla and Musk have to pay a fine, and the Tesla chief will step down from the supervisory board, however, he will be able to remain CEO.
Tesla and Musk will have to pay, and the Tesla chief executive will step down from the board, but he will be allowed to remain chief executive.

seg.source: Parteitag der britischen Konservativen
seg.translation: The British Conservative Party Conference
British Conservative party conference
British Conservative Party Conference

seg.source: Scharf bewacht - der Parteitag der Tories
seg.translation: Under tight security - the Tory party conference
Closely guarded - the Tory party conference
Tightly guarded - the Tory party conference

seg.source: Birmingham wird zur Bühne eines Machtkampfes.
seg.translation: Birmingham becomes the stage for a power struggle.
Birmingham become the stage of a power struggle.
Birmingham is becoming the stage for a power struggle.

seg.source: Auf dem Parteitag soll es um Außenpolitik, Handelsfragen und Entwicklungspolitik gehen, doch überschattet wird die viertägige Konferenz von dem Streit zwischen Premierministerin Theresa May und den Brexit-Hardlinern, an vorderster Front Ex-Außenminister Boris Johnson.
seg.translation: The party conference was to address foreign policy, trade issues and development policy, but the four-day conference was overshadowed by the conflict between Prime Minister, Theresa May and the Brexit hardliners, with ex-Foreign Minister, Boris Johnson in the frontline.

The main topics on the agenda are foreign policy, trade issues and development policy, but the four-day conference is being overshadowed by the dispute between Prime Minister Theresa May and Brexit hardliners, headed by ex-Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson.

The party conference is expected to focus on foreign policy, trade and development, but the four-day conference will be overshadowed by the row between Prime Minister Theresa May and Brexit hardliners, led by ex-Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson.

seg.source: Referendum für einen neuen Staatsnamen
seg.translation: Referendum for a new state name
Referendum on new country name
Referendum for a new state name

seg.source: Die Außenminister Mazedoniens (rechts) und Griechenlands haben sich schon geeinigt
seg.translation: The foreign ministers of Macedonia (right) and Greece have reached agreement
The foreign ministers of Macedonia (right) and Greece have come to an agreement
The foreign ministers of Macedonia (right) and Greece have already reached an agreement

seg.source: Mazedonien ist ein Staat auf dem Balkan, Mazedonien ist aber auch eine Provinz in Nord-Griechenland.
seg.translation: Macedonia is a state in the Balkans, but Macedonia is also a province in Northern Greece.
Macedonia is the name of a state in the Balkans, Macedonia is also the name of a province in northern Greece.
Macedonia is a state in the Balkans, but Macedonia is also a province in northern Greece.

seg.source: Skopje und Athen streiten über diese Namensdopplungen schon seit Jahren.
seg.translation: Skopje and Athens have been arguing about the duplicate name for years.
Skopje and Athens have been in dispute over the name issue for years.
Skopje and Athens have been arguing over these duplications of names for years.

seg.source: Jetzt haben sie sich geeinigt.
seg.translation: Now they have come to an agreement.
Now they have come to an agreement.
Now they have agreed.

seg.source: Der Staat Mazedonien soll künftig Nord-Mazedonien heißen und darüber stimmt an diesem Sonntag die Bevölkerung ab - ob es gut geht?
seg.translation: In future, the state of Macedonia is to be called North Macedonia and the population will vote on this measure on Sunday from the population - will it turn out okay?

From now on, the state of Macedonia will be called North Macedonia and this Sunday, Macedonians will go to the polls to vote on the name change. Whether this will be the end of the issue remains to be seen.
The state of Macedonia is to be called Northern Macedonia in the future, and the population will vote on it this Sunday - will it be all right?

seg.source: Proteste in Brasilien gegen Rechtspopulisten Bolsonaro.
seg.translation: Protests in Brazil against right-wing populist Bolsonaro.
Protests in Brazil against right-wing populist Bolsonaro.
Protests in Brazil against right-wing populist Bolsonaro.

seg.source: "Ele Nao" ("Der nicht") - gemeint ist Jair Bolsonaro.
seg.translation: Ele Nao ("Not him") - addressed to Jair Bolsonaro.
"Ele Nao" ("Not Him") - the man in question is Jair Bolsonaro.
"Ele Nao" ("The Not") - meaning Jair Bolsonaro.

seg.source: Eine Woche vor der Präsidentschaftswahl in Brasilien ist die Stimmung im Land gespalten.
seg.translation: One week before the presidential election in Brazil and the mood in the country is divided.
One week before the presidential election in Brazil, the mood is split.
A week before Brazil's presidential election, the mood in the country is divided.

seg.source: Tausende gingen in mehreren Städten auf die Straße, um gegen den Rechtspopulisten Jair Bolsonaro zu protestieren.
seg.translation: In many cities thousands are taking to the street to protest against the right-wing populist Jair Bolsonaro.
Thousands marched in the streets across several cities to protests against the right-wing populist Jair Bolsonaro.
Thousands took to the streets in several cities to protest against right-wing populist Jair Bolsonaro.

seg.source: Der "Trump Brasiliens" gibt sich als Anti-System-Kandidat und liegt damit in den Umfragen vorne.
seg.translation: The ‘Brazilian Trump’ is presenting himself as an anti-system candidate and is ahead in the polls.
The "Brazilian Trump" has presented himself as an anti-establishment candidate and is currently ahead in the polls.
The "Trump of Brazil" presents himself as an anti-system candidate and is thus ahead in the polls.

seg.source: Sein schärfster Konkurrent ist Fernando Haddad von der Linken Arbeiterpartei.
seg.translation: His keenest competitor is Fernando Haddad from the left workers’ party.
His closest rival is Fernando Haddad of the left-wing Worker's Party.
His closest rival is Fernando Haddad of the left-wing Workers' Party.
